stepTitle: Rosie owes $21,540 on her two student loans. The interest rate on her bank loan is 10.5% and the interest rate on the federal loan is 5.9%. The total amount of interest she paid last year was $1,669.68. What was the principal for each loan? (Answer in the form with the number of a variable followed by the first letter of the variable (bank $$=$$ b, federal $$=$$ f): 20b30f (These numbers are not the answers))
